tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Course (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR, credits INT, semester_offered INT);

CREATE TABLE Prerequisite (course_id INT, prereq_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (course_id, prereq_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id), FOREIGN KEY (prereq_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id));

CREATE TABLE StudentProgression (student_id INT, course_id INT, semester_taken INT, grade VARCHAR, PRIMARY KEY (student_id, course_id), FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Student(student_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id));

CREATE TABLE Prerequisite (
    prerequisite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    prereq_course_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (prereq_course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Enrollment (
    enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    completed BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Student(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id)
);
